BBQFS.A.DE.LIFE.CRIT_INT_Q25._X.0000: Critical interest rate level for life insurers given an upsurge of policy lapses over which the stability of 25% of the assessed German life insurers is endangered (FSR 2014)
Methodology: The analysis covered the approximately 60 largest German life insurance companies with a premium reserve of more than 1 billion ¤ each.
